round towards the nearest neighbor, unless both neighbors are equidistant, in which case round away from zero. (default)
trans-unit.target: 向最近的邻居进位,除非两个邻居距离相等,否则从零开始进位。(默认)

trans-unit.source: round towards the nearest neighbor, unless both neighbors are equidistant, in which case round towards the even neighbor (Banker's rounding)
trans-unit.target: 向最近的邻居进位,除非两个邻居的距离相等,在这种情况下,向偶数邻居进位(银行家的进位)。

trans-unit.source: round towards the nearest neighbor, unless both neighbors are equidistant, in which case round towards zero.
trans-unit.target: 向最近的邻居进位,除非两个邻居的距离相等,在这种情况下,向零进位。

s = StringScanner.new(“Fri Dec 12 1975 14:39”) s.inspect # -> '#<StringScanner 0/21 @ “Fri D…”>' s.scan_until /12/ # -> “Fri Dec 12” s.inspect # -> '#<StringScanner 10/21 “…ec 12” @ “ 1975…”>'
trans-unit.target: s = StringScanner.new （“ Fri Dec 12 1975 14:39”）s.inspect＃->'＃<StringScanner 0/21 @“ Fri D…”>'s.scan_until / 12 /＃->“ Fri Dec 12 ” s.inspect＃->'＃<StringScanner 10/21“…ec 12” @“ 1975…”>'

trans-unit.source: s.shutdown(Socket::SHUT_RDWR) disallows further read and write.

save_data（原始校验和，原始文件大小，文件）显示源

trans-unit.source: scanf for Ruby compared with scanf in C

scanf for Ruby is based on something of an amalgam of C scanf implementations and documentation, rather than on a single canonical description. Suggestions for features and behaviors which appear in other scanfs, and would be meaningful in Ruby, are welcome, as are reports of suspicious behaviors and/or bugs. (Please see “Credits and acknowledgements”, above, for email addresses.)
trans-unit.target: Ruby的scanf基于C scanf的实现和文档的混合物，而不是基于一个规范的描述。我们欢迎您提出关于其他scanfs中可能在Ruby中有意义的功能和行为的建议，以及有关可疑行为和/或错误的报告。（有关电子邮件地址，请参阅上面的“信用和确认”。）

trans-unit.source: scanf for Ruby is based on the C function scanf(3), but with modifications, dictated mainly by the underlying differences between the languages.
trans-unit.target: scanf for Ruby基于C函数scanf(3),但主要是根据不同语言之间的差异进行了修改。

trans-unit.source: scanf for Ruby returns an array of successful conversions, whereas scanf(3) returns the number of conversions successfully completed. (See below for more details on scanf for Ruby's return values.)
trans-unit.target: scanf for Ruby 返回一个成功转换的数组,而 scanf(3)返回成功完成的转换次数。(更多关于scanf for Ruby的返回值的细节请看下文。)

trans-unit.source: scanf is an implementation of the C function scanf(3), modified as necessary for Ruby compatibility.
trans-unit.target: scanf是C函数scanf(3)的一个实现,为了兼容Ruby而做了必要的修改。

trans-unit.source: scanf was developed as the major activity of the Austin Ruby Codefest (Austin, Texas, August 2002).
trans-unit.target: scanf是作为奥斯汀Ruby Codefest(德克萨斯州奥斯汀,2002年8月)的主要活动开发的。

trans-unit.source: scheme and host are converted to lowercase,
scrypt is designed to be memory-hard and more secure against brute-force attacks using custom hardwares than alternative KDFs such as PBKDF2 or bcrypt.
trans-unit.target: 与PBKDF2或bcrypt等其他KDF相比,scrypt被设计为内存硬体,并且对使用自定义硬体的暴力攻击更加安全。

trans-unit.source: so that scanf can keep track of characters correctly.

trans-unit.source: sockaddr is specified as an array or a string. The array should be compatible to the value of IPSocket#addr or UNIXSocket#addr. The string should be struct sockaddr as generated by Socket.sockaddr_in or Socket.unpack_sockaddr_un.
trans-unit.target: sockaddr被指定为数组或字符串。该数组应与 IPSocket#addr 或 UNIXSocket#addr 的值兼容。该字符串应该是结构sockaddr由作为产生 Socket.sockaddr_in 或 Socket.unpack_sockaddr_un 。

trans-unit.source: socktype is specified as an integer to specify the socket type such as Socket::SOCK_STREAM. It can be a symbol or a string which is the constant name with or without SOCK_ prefix such as :STREAM, :DGRAM, :RAW, “SOCK_STREAM”, etc. If omitted, 0 is assumed.
trans-unit.target: socktype被指定为整数以指定套接字类型，例如Socket :: SOCK_STREAM。它可以是符号或字符串，可以是带有或不带有SOCK_前缀的常量名称，例如：STREAM，：DGRAM，：RAW，“ SOCK_STREAM”等。如果省略，则假定为0。
sort_dependencies（依赖项，已激活，冲突）显示源

trans-unit.source: source buffer is empty (:source_buffer_empty) this occur only when :partial_input is specified.
trans-unit.target: 源缓冲区为空(:source_buffer_empty),只有当指定了:partial_input时才会出现这种情况。
来源（来源，cls =自我）显示来源

trans-unit.source: source_buffer should be a string or nil. nil means an empty string.
trans-unit.target: source_buffer应该是一个字符串或nil,nil表示一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: source_string is assumed as a part of source. i.e. :partial_input=>true is specified internally. finish method should be used last.
trans-unit.target: 假设source_string是source的一部分。即：partial_input => true在内部指定。完成方法应最后使用。

trans-unit.source: spawn closes all non-standard unspecified descriptors by default. The “standard” descriptors are 0, 1 and 2. This behavior is specified by :close_others option. :close_others doesn't affect the standard descriptors which are closed only if :close is specified explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，spawn关闭所有非标准未指定的描述符。“标准”描述符为0、1和2。此行为由：close_others选项指定。：close_others不会影响仅在显式指定：close时关闭的标准描述符。

trans-unit.source: spawn executes specified command and return its pid.
trans-unit.target: spawn执行指定的命令并返回其pid。

trans-unit.source: spawn has bunch of options to specify process attributes:
trans-unit.target: spawn有一堆选项来指定进程属性。

trans-unit.target: 将spec的load_from路径与之对应展开,得到full_gem_path
spec（名称，版本，平台=无）显示源

trans-unit.source: specifies encoding of received query string. If omitted, @@accept_charset is used. If the encoding is not valid, a CGI::InvalidEncoding will be raised.
trans-unit.target: 指定接收到的查询字符串的编码。如果省略，则使用 @@accept_charset 。如果编码无效，则将引发 CGI::InvalidEncoding 。

trans-unit.source: specify the name resolution timeout in seconds.

trans-unit.target: 指定超时时间,以秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: split into single-level threads according to subject, ordered by date.
trans-unit.target: 按照主题分割成单层线程,按日期排序。

trans-unit.source: split into threads by parent/child relationships determined by which message is a reply to which.
trans-unit.target: 按父/子关系分割成线程,由哪条消息是对哪条消息的回复决定。

trans-unit.source: srand may be used to ensure repeatable sequences of pseudo-random numbers between different runs of the program. By setting the seed to a known value, programs can be made deterministic during testing.
trans-unit.target: srand可以用来确保程序不同运行之间伪随机数的可重复序列。通过将种子设置为一个已知值,可以使程序在测试过程中具有确定性。
